about_the_game: Dive into the delightful world of chocolate with Choco Boy. An engaging idle clicker game where you, the player, embark on a sweet journey to craft the finest chocolates, maximize your choc drops and expand your operations. Tap your way to chocolate mastery, upgrade your resources and uncover new processes through your chocolate making adventure, and watch as Choco Boy is consumed again and again in the delicious chaos of chocolate-making. It's a whimsical adventure that promises endless fun and mouth-watering excitement!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 / AMD Radeon HD 6850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
